about.title: About INO
about.subtitle: Discover the world of orienteering with us
about.whatIsInoDesc: INO (Impreza na Orientację) is Poland's premier orienteering event series, combining navigation skills with outdoor adventure in beautiful natural settings.
about.howItWorksDesc: Using map and compass, participants navigate through checkpoints in forests, parks, and urban areas. It's a perfect blend of physical activity and mental challenge.
about.whyJoinDesc: Improve your navigation skills, explore new places, meet like-minded adventurers, and challenge yourself in a supportive community environment.

footer.newsletterDesc: Stay updated with our latest events
